oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Was trägt die Biobranche zu „Zukunftsfähigem Wohlstand“ in Berlin-Brandenburg bei?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schäfer, Prof. Dr. Dr. Martina
Nölting, Dr. Benjamin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Enterprises of the organic food sector contribute in various ways to sustainable devel-opment, wealth, and quality of life in their region. We present a preliminary description and evaluation of these multi-dimensional effects (telephone interviews with directors of 58 enterprises) and the institutional framework conditions of the organic food sector in the region of Berlin and Brandenburg in north-east Germany.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schäfer, Prof. Dr. Dr. Martina and Nölting, Dr. Benjamin (2005) Was trägt die Biobranche zu „Zukunftsfähigem Wohlstand“ in Berlin-Brandenburg bei? [What does the organic food sector contribute to „sustainable wealth“ in the region of Berlin-Brandenburg?] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
